Text: I learn what jihad means every time I turn on the news, and it's always reprehensible.
well... if your knowledge source is from CNN then i have nothing to say.
Freakazoidski you won't go far with your hatred and narrow mindedness! Read some books...

I don't think I have heard this speaker yet. Looking forward to it. Thanks for the upload =).

Let God be our love and our fear, and nothing in this world shall have us enslaved.

We cannot be held responsible for what their governments and media constantly do to malign us (noticing the reactions that have been bred into societies by the simple word 'jihad' that their outlets continuously repeat to them as if their people are no less than sheep, and we know from having been under horrible governments ourselves), but we can certainly do our best to live our life on our own terms, and the beauty will prevail.

Peace be to the righteous.

Imam Awlaki is one of the best speakers out there, you should really listen to his lectures otherwise you will miss a lot.
